Kenneth Stanley wrote:

>It sounds like under that scheme the worst individuals have the same 
>chance of reproducing as the best?  That does sound like it 
>preserves diversity but it has almost no convergence.  Perhaps if 
>you want diversity a roulette wheel method would be better.
>
>ken
>  
>
Yup, Actually Roulette Wheel with elitism is the best description for 
SharpNEAT  in its current incarnation. The twist is that I can define 
the top % of the population that takes part in the roulette wheel.

Colin.
